docs.lead_paragraph: DeVry University, a for-profit institution, has landed 15 students on the United States team heading to the Sochi Games.
docs.abstract: Devry University, for-profit school that is an advertising staple of late-night television, surprises sports world by landing some 15 students on United States Olympic team; athletes include serious medal contenders in Alpine skiing, bobsled and luge, courtesy of partnership university signed in 2011 with the United States Olympic Committee.

headline.main: DeVry Becomes an Unlikely Olympic Powerhouse
